bedrockDialogueEditor.name: Bedrock Dialogue Editor
bedrockDialogueEditor.autoOpen.title: Auto Open
bedrockDialogueEditor.autoOpen.desc: Automatically open dialogue files in the node editor.
Switch focus to the dialogue editor tab when opening.

This only has an effect if `#bedrockDialogueEditor.editorOpenLocation#` is set to `beside`.
bedrockDialogueEditor.editorOpenLocation: The column that the dialogue editor should open in when called from the `openNodeEditor` command.
The dialogue editor opens in the *active* view column.
The dialogue editor opens in the view column *next* to the active one.
bedrockDialogueEditor.nodeColors.title: Editor Node Colours
bedrockDialogueEditor.nodeColors.desc: Colour codes for nodes in the visual editor.
bedrockDialogueEditor.nodeColors.sceneDa: The scene node's dark theme colour.
bedrockDialogueEditor.nodeColors.buttonD: The button node's dark theme colour.
bedrockDialogueEditor.nodeColors.command: The command node's dark theme colour.
